title: Power cut schedule from June 6 to 12 announced
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) has approved the power cut schedule from June 6 to 12, PUCSL Chairman Janaka Rathnayake said.
Accordingly, two hours and fifteen minutes power shedding will be imposed from June 6 to 10 and one hour power shedding on June 11 and 12.
The power cut will be imposed on June 6 to 8 beween 10.45 am to 10.15 pm and from June 9 to 10 beween 10.45 am to 10.15 pm.
The power shedding on June 11 and 12 will be between 6.30 p.m. and 10.00 p.m.
